message: I use Citrix server for my latest servers. But there is no real support for the fancy VM monitoring stuff. I also get ata errors... Am not too impressed by citrix server after all, they spam you every time you open the console and worst of all the management software only runs on windows.

This is the lovely entry in my messages: 

ad1: TIMEOUT - WRITE_DMA retrying (1 retry left) LBA=50847487

VM FTW ;)
